org.apache.giraph.utils

类 EdgeComparator<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.utils.EdgeComparator<I,E>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    E - Edge value (needs to be WritableComparable)
    所有已实现的接口:
    Comparator<Edge<I,E>>

    public class EdgeComparator<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable>
extends Object
implements Comparator<Edge<I,E>>
    Comparator for edges.

        public static <I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable> int compareEdges(Edge<I,E> e1,
                                                                                                                     Edge<I,E> e2)
        Compares two edges.
        类型参数:
        I - Vertex id
        E - Edge value (needs to be WritableComparable)
        参数:
        e1 - First edge
        e2 - Second edge
        返回:
        A negative, zero, or positive value depending

      • equal

        类型参数:
        I - Vertex id
        E - Edge value (needs to be WritableComparable)
        参数:
        e1 - First edge
        e2 - Second edge
        返回:
